job.title: Cloud Operations Engineer I
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Biotechnology,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: The Cloud Operations (CloudOps) Engineer I is responsible for all aspects of our AWS environment, as well as FMI software deployment CI/CD pipeline; including design, provisioning, monitoring, automation, and maintenance of our software suite. The position works with customers, investigates cloud incident reports, and as a member of the CloudOps team is change champion in the adoption of new ways to build and release code. The incumbent partners with development teams to maintain best practices, integrate continuous automated testing, instantiate automation scripts, maintain and operate CI/CD pipeline software, and partners with product teams to promote DevOps principles within our AWS centric environment.
